pkgmetadata.longdescription: Environmental variables for building: XPRA_HTML5_BROWSER - sets the browser for the menu item XPRA_HTML5_PORT - sets the port to access the xpra-html5 frontend XPRA_HTML5_PROTO - set to either "http" or "https" XPRA_HTML5_SERVER - sets the hostname or IP address of the server to access the xpra-html5 frontend. Use localhost for this computer.

use.flag: Installs the client for http server use. XPRA_HTML5_BROWSER, XPRA_HTML5_PROTO, XPRA_HTML5_SERVER, XPRA_HTML5_PORT must all be set.
Installs the client for local use.
Installs just the desktop menu to the http server. XPRA_HTML5_BROWSER, XPRA_HTML5_PROTO, XPRA_HTML5_SERVER, XPRA_HTML5_PORT must all be set.
